2checkout.title: 2-Checkout
2checkout.teaser: Our 2checkout Payment App provides integration between Payplans and 2checkout.com.

activateafterpayment.title: Activate after Payment
activateafterpayment.teaser: Unlike the other payplans registration plugin, which activates the user after choosing the plan, this registration plugin will activate the user after the payment is received.

acymailing.title: ACYmailing
acymailing.teaser: ACYmailing plugin provides integration of ACYmailing with PayPlans.

adagency.title: AdAgency
adagency.teaser: This app is to integrate ad-agency component with payplans. Ad Agency is a component that is used to create and post different types of advertisements on specified URLs.

advancedpricing.title: Advance Pricing
advancedpricing.teaser: Advanced Pricing app allows administrator to sell one plan with different variations.

alipay.title: Alipay
alipay.teaser: Alipay is one of the most widely used payment method in China. Alipay is China’s leading third-party online payment solution, providing an easy, safe and secure way for millions of individuals and businesses to make and receive payments. Integration with Alipay only supports fixed payments.

assignplan.title: Assign Plan
assignplan.teaser: Assign Plan App is used for assigning plan to user on different status of subscription.

aup.title: AUP
aup.teaser: Sell Alpha User points with subscriptions.

aupdiscount.title: AUP Discount
aupdiscount.teaser: Provide discount during subscriptions on basis of Alpha User points.

authorizecim.title: Authorize CIM
authorizecim.teaser: Authorize CIM App can be a way to get paid using Authorize CIM payment gateway.

authorize.title: Authorize.net
authorize.teaser: Authorize.Net App is a way to allow merchants to accept payment through Authorize.Net, using Payplans.

autologin.title: Auto Login
autologin.teaser: Auto Login is a plugin which automatically logs-in the user after paying for the plan which the user has subscribed.

bankaudi.title: BankAudi
bankaudi.teaser: This app integrates Payplans with Bank Audi, Lebanon. Customers can pay through their Audi Bank Account.

discount.title: Basic Discount
discount.teaser: Discount Plugin allows you to create Discount Coupon to be used during purchase.

basictax.title: Basic Tax
basictax.teaser: This plugin applies basic taxation as per country.

nets.title: BBS Nets
nets.teaser: BBS/Nets is a popular Scandinavian payment gateway. It is a Nordic provider of payments, card and information services with a European ambition. This integration uses the "Hosted" option where user will be redirected to the gateway site to login and pay.Once payment is completed, the page will redirect back to your site.

comprofiler.title: CB Registration
comprofiler.teaser: Integrate Community Builder Registration with PayPlans through this plugin.

ccavenue.title: CCAvenue
ccavenue.teaser: CCAvenue® is South Asia’s largest payment gateway solution powering thousands of eMerchants with real time, multi-currency, multiple payment options online payment processing services.

ccbill.title: CCBill
ccbill.teaser: CCBill is the leader in online virtual vendor global billing services.

community_acl.title: Community ACL
community_acl.teaser: Our Community ACL plugin provides integration of Community ACL with PayPlans.

contentacl.title: Content ACL
contentacl.teaser: Content ACL App allows you to apply access control on any Joomla content as per subscription status of users.

content.title: Content App
content.teaser: This app can change the content of pages of Payplans with your custom content without template over-riding. These custome content can be change by some dynamic content.

contenthider.title: Content Hider
contenthider.teaser: A plugin to hide article's selected contents from unsubscribed users. Also, you can specify the plans whose subscription will show the hidden content to the customers.

contentseller.title: Content Seller
contentseller.teaser: Content Seller can be used to sell individual article without setting up multiple plans and apps into PayPlans.

dashboardwidget.title: Dashboard Widget
dashboardwidget.teaser: DashBoard Widget App is used for the customization of the PayPlans DashBoard.

defaultplan.title: Default Plan
defaultplan.teaser: Default Plan plugin assigns a default plan to the user whenever a new user registers to a PayPlan-enabled site.

deltapay.title: DeltaPay
deltapay.teaser: Alpha Bank’s e-commerce solution, is currently using the DeltaPAY e-commerce platform.

docman.title: Docman
docman.teaser: This app will add user to particular user group of Docman when user subscribe any plans through Payplans.

donation.title: Donation
donation.teaser: Donation plug-in provides functionality to get donations from your customers via  any payment method that is available( like: paypal,offline payment ,paypal pro etc.) if they want to make donation for you.

donation module.title: Donation Module
donation module.teaser: Donation plug-in provides functionality to get donations from your customers via any payment method that is available( like: paypal,offline payment ,paypal pro etc.) if they want to make donation for you.

edbadges.title: Easy Discuss Badges
edbadges.teaser: This app is used to integrate Easydiscuss component with Payplans.

edcategory.title: Easy Discuss Categories
edcategory.teaser: This app is used to integrate Easydiscuss component with Payplans.

easyblog.title: EasyBlog
easyblog.teaser: Our EasyBlog plugin provides integration of EasyBlog with PayPlans.

easyblogsubmission.title: EasyBlog Submission
easyblogsubmission.teaser: This app is used to restrict the user to post not more than maximum limit specified according to subscribed plan.

easysocialprofiletype.title: EasySocial Profile Type
easysocialprofiletype.teaser: Easysocial-Profile Type app can be used for providing profile types as per subscribed plans.

easysocialregistration.title: EasySocial Registration
easysocialregistration.teaser: Easysocial-Registration plugin can be used for user registration through EasySocial.

ebs.title: EBS
ebs.teaser: This app allows you to accept payments via EBS (an Indian Payment Gateway)

euvat.title: EU-VAT
euvat.teaser: This plugin allows you to calculate taxes as per European Union value added tax (or EU VAT) system.

eventlist.title: Event List
eventlist.teaser: Using EventList Plugin you can integrate EventList extension with Payplans.

eway.title: eWay
eway.teaser: Accept credit cards on your website with the Australian payment gateway.

export.title: Export
export.teaser: Now, Payplans is provided with facility of exporting payplans subscription and invoicing data that can be use in any other analysing software and for many accounting software.

fixeddateexpiration.title: Fixed Date Expiration
fixeddateexpiration.teaser: Fixed-date-expiration app allows you to provide subscription till a specific calendar date not according to plan expiration time.

ganalytics.title: G-Analytics
ganalytics.teaser: Want to convert visitors into customers ? If this is your state of mind then payplans is here to provide integartion with G-Analytics. Now Monitor your live site with real environment.

gate2shop.title: Gate2shop
gate2shop.teaser: G2S provides a secure online e-commerce solution for small to mid-sized businesses. Whether your goal is to sell software online, monetize games, or distribute other digital goods, Gate2Shop has the skills, tools, technology, and expertise to help you. Software vendors and digital service providers can use a secure and reliable platform to succeed in their online endeavors. This app integrate Gate2Shop with payplans, supports for fixed recurring as well as Recurring and Recurring+trial_1 payments.

httpquery.title: http Query
httpquery.teaser: The HTTP Query  app sends out HTTP request to URL on the basis of the subscription status of the plan subscribed by the user.

Helpdesk Clients.title: iMaQma Helpdesk Clients
Helpdesk Clients.teaser: The Helpdesk Component is an advanced support system with which you will be able to implement, manage and create a flexible customer support solution, efficient for both customers and support staff.

Helpdesk Knowledge Baseacl.title: iMaQma Helpdesk Knowledge Base Acl
Helpdesk Knowledge Baseacl.teaser: Knowledge base is functionality of helpdesk extension, so that majorly posted forums are converted to the knowledge bases articles so that they will be appear in faqs.

Helpdesk Ticket.title: iMaQma Helpdesk Ticket
Helpdesk Ticket.teaser: The ImaqMa Helpdesk Component is an advanced support system with which you will be able to implement, manage and create a flexible customer support solution, efficient for both customers and support staff.

invitex.title: Invitex
invitex.teaser: Invitex app provides, functionality to restrict users to  send limited invitations according to plan subscribed.

jevents.title: JEvents
jevents.teaser: Our Jevent plugin provides integration of JEvents with PayPlans.

jfbconnect.title: JFB Connect
jfbconnect.teaser: JFBConnect Registration plugin integrates JFBConnect registration with PayPlans.

jinc.title: JINC
jinc.teaser: Our JINC plugin provides integration of JINC with PayPlans.

jnews.title: Jnews
jnews.teaser: Our JNews Plugin provides integration of Jnews with PayPlans.

jsmultiprofiletype.title: Jom Social Multi-Profile Types
jsmultiprofiletype.teaser: This plugins ask customer to pay for having premium profile types in JomSocial community.

jomsocial.title: Jomsocial Registration
jomsocial.teaser: Integrate Jomsocial Registration with PayPlans.

joomla.title: Joomla Registration
joomla.teaser: Joomla Registration plugin integrates Joomla registration with PayPlans.

xiprofiletype.title: Joomlaxi Profile Type
xiprofiletype.teaser: Joomlaxi Profile Type plugin for Controlling Jomsocial Profile Type.

jreview.title: JReview
jreview.teaser: JReview is an component used to post listings in different available categories (Joomla categories) and any user can write review about the listing and rate the listings according to some criteria specified.

juga.title: JUGA
juga.teaser: Our JUGA plugin provides integration of JUGA with PayPlans.

jusertype.title: Juser Type
jusertype.teaser: App for Controlling Joomla user type. This will integrate Joomla User Type to Payplans.You can assign any User type to related Subscription Plan.

k2 category.title: K2 Category Access Control
k2 category.teaser: Allow/disallow user's submission of articles to different categories of K2 on subscription status of selected plan.

k2 item.title: K2 Item Access Control
k2 item.teaser: K2 Item Access Control provides you the functionality to restrict the accessibility of items for users. of K2.

k2.title: K2 User Group Access
k2.teaser: Our K2 plugin provides integration of K2 with PayPlans.

kissmetrics.title: KISSmetrics
kissmetrics.teaser: This app facilitates administrator to track events of PayPlans and notification of tracking recorde with KissMetrics.

kunena.title: Kunena Forum
kunena.teaser: Our Kunena forum plugin provides access to Kunena categories according to the subscription status.

Language Pack (de).title: Language Pack (de)
Language Pack (de).teaser: Language packs provides the flexibility for updating language files of PayPlans.

Language Pack (en).title: Language Pack (en)
Language Pack (en).teaser: Language packs provides the flexibility for updating language files of PayPlans.

Language Pack (fr).title: Language Pack (fr)
Language Pack (fr).teaser: Language packs provides the flexibility for updating language files of PayPlans.

Language Pack (sv).title: Language Pack (sv)
Language Pack (sv).teaser: Language packs provides the flexibility for updating language files of PayPlans.

Limit Subscription.title: Limit Subscription
Limit Subscription.teaser: If you want that, user should not be able to subscribe same plan(s) again and again then this is the best way to stop them.

mailchimp.title: MailChimp
mailchimp.teaser: Our MailChimp Plugin provides integration of MailChimp with PayPlans.

mailster.title: Mailster Newsletter
mailster.teaser: Mailster is Newsletter component which allows you to create Lists, Groups and sends Newsletters to subscribers of these groups.

menuaccess.title: Menu Access
menuaccess.teaser: Menu Access app controls display of menus according to plan subscribed by a user.

moduleaccess.title: Module Access
moduleaccess.teaser: Module Access app controls display of modules according to plan subscribed by a user.

moneybookers.title: MoneyBookers
moneybookers.teaser: This app allows you to accept payments via MoneyBookers.

mtreepayplans.title: Moset Tree
mtreepayplans.teaser: Mtree Plugin provides integration of Mosets Tree with PayPlans.

multiloginrestriction.title: Multi Login Restriction
multiloginrestriction.teaser: Multi-Login-Restriction forbid login access of one user account from different computers/browsers at the same time.

mysqlquery.title: MySQL Query
mysqlquery.teaser: MySQL Query app allows execution of a my sql query on the basis of user's subscription status.

netcash.title: Netcash
netcash.teaser: It provides Integration between Payplans and Netcash Payment Gateway.

ninjaboard.title: Ninjaboard
ninjaboard.teaser: Our NinjaBoard Plugin provides integration of NinjaBoard with PayPlans.

email.title: Notification Emailer
email.teaser: Now get your users on top of emails. Yes, Notification Emailer app is here to give notifications updates to your users as you want.

offlinepayment.title: Offline Payment
offlinepayment.teaser: Offline Payment is an useful payment app, its used when admin want to payment through Cash or D.D.

ogone.title: Ogone
ogone.teaser: The App provide integration with Ogone payment service, which is one of the leading European Payment Service Providers with more than 33.000 clients across 45 countries.

oneclickcheckout.title: One Click Checkout
oneclickcheckout.teaser: One-click-checkout is a plugin, which make it possible to subscribe any plan just by single click.

pagseguro.title: PagSeguro
pagseguro.teaser: Payplans integration with PagSeguro Payment Gateway allows you to accept payments via PagSeguro, the leading Brazilian provider of online payments.

parentchild.title: Parent Child
parentchild.teaser: This App supports Parent-Child Relationship in plan subscription. If parent plan is not subscribed then its dependent child plans will also not work.

paxum.title: paxum
paxum.teaser: Paxum offers a secure ewallet payment service that lets users pay merchants by transferring funds from banks.

paybywallet.title: Pay By Wallet
paybywallet.teaser: PayByWallet app allow users to pay from their balance exist in wallet. It’s different from the other payment methods.

paywithpoints.title: Pay With Points
paywithpoints.teaser: Alpha User points and JomSocial can distribute or assign points to registered users according to some of its actions and activity on your website. PayPlans provides you the functionality of selling membership on the basis of these points.

payfast.title: PayFast
payfast.teaser: PayFast is a payments processing service for South Africans and South African websites.

payflow.title: PayFlow
payflow.teaser: Payflow payment gateway handles all major credit cards. What makes our gateway different is the low rates and incremental sales boost from offering PayPal and credit card payment options on your site.

paygate.title: PayGate
paygate.teaser: This app allows you to accept payments via PayGate.

paypal.title: PayPal
paypal.teaser: Our Paypal Payment App provides integration between Payplans and Paypal. Through this app customers can pay with their Paypal account or Credit Card.

payseal.title: Payseal
payseal.teaser: This gateway provide online banking solutions by support, payments through mastercard, visa and maestro cards. and it also support refunds.

alertpay.title: Payza
alertpay.teaser: Payza(formerly known as alert AlertPay),is a global online payment platform specializing in ecommerce processing, corporate disbursements, and remittances for individuals and businesses around the world.

pdfinvoice.title: PDF Invoice
pdfinvoice.teaser: PDF Invoice App allows you to create and download printable payment bills in PDF form.

phoca.title: Phoca Download
phoca.teaser: Our Phoca Download plugin provides integration of Phoca Download with PayPlans.

pin.title: Pin
pin.teaser: A very unique feature of PIN payment gateway is that administrators do not need to setup merchant account. When your customers make a payment, funds are transferred to your existing bank account.

planmodifier.title: Plan Dynamic Modifier
planmodifier.teaser: Plan dynamic modifier is used to change plan at the time of subscription.

pap.title: Post Affiliate Pro
pap.teaser: Our Post-Affiliate Pro App provides integration of Post-Affiliate Pro with Payplans.

prodiscount.title: Pro Discount
prodiscount.teaser: Earlier when you created different discount apps, they took considerable time to complete their task, but this new plugin provided with PayPlans 2.1 will decrease event triggers and speedup the discounting tasks.

auto.title: Quick Registration
auto.teaser: Quick Registration Plugin is a plugin which allows users to register on our site in few seconds.

quickpay.title: QuickPay
quickpay.teaser: Our QuickPay Plugin provides integration of QuickPay with PayPlans.

renewal.title: Renewal
renewal.teaser: Renewal plugin will be used to renew existing subscribed plan.

rokfeaturetable.title: RokFeature Table
rokfeaturetable.teaser: RokFeatureTable is template integrated module which is perfect for plan comparisons. It is stylish & user friendly.

setcom.title: Setcom
setcom.teaser: Setcom Payment App integrates Paypans to Setcom Payment gateway. Payment can be completed by Instant EFT (SID) and Credit Card (Setcom).

sobi2.title: Sobi2
sobi2.teaser: Our Sobi2 plugin provides integration of Sobi2 with PayPlans.

sobipro.title: SobiPro
sobipro.teaser: SobiPro plugin controls the number of entries in SobiPro Sections.

socialdiscount.title: Social Discount
socialdiscount.teaser: Give discount to your customers for Facebook Like, Tweet & G+.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.teaser: Stripe offers online payment solution for growing business. it’s an payment gateway which ensures secure payment by their fully developed and versatile api. customer can pay through their credit card, and merchant gets instant notifications, they also supports for refund.

subscriptionapproval.title: Subscription Approval
subscriptionapproval.teaser: Approval App can be used to stop the automatic activation of subscription. Only Admin user(s) will be able to activate the subscription from back-end.

subscriptiondetail.title: Subscription Detail
subscriptiondetail.teaser: This app can be used to get some additional details with each subscription, from the customers.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.teaser: Terms of Service app forces user to agree terms and conditions.

themebuilder.title: Theme Builder
themebuilder.teaser: An app to create your own themes

tienda.title: Tienda
tienda.teaser: Our Tienda plugin provides integration of Tienda with PayPlans.

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.teaser: Upgrade app Plugin is used to switch from current plan to another plan.

usedtimemonitor.title: Used Time Monitor
usedtimemonitor.teaser: Used-Time-Monitor is an app, which is used to provide access to the subscribers  for some particular time period within the expiration time of plan.

userdetail.title: User Detail
userdetail.teaser: User-detail app is used to show additional details of the user. Using this app administrator can ask additional details from user.

userpreference.title: User Preferences
userpreference.teaser: This App allow user to submit his preferences through Payplans DashBoard Widget.

virtuemart.title: VirtueMart
virtuemart.teaser: Our VirtueMart plugin provides integration of VirtueMart Shopping Cart with PayPlans.

zoo.title: Zoo
zoo.teaser: Zoo app can be used to control access to Zoo Category on the basis of user's subscription status.

zooelement.title: Zoo Element
zooelement.teaser: It provides you the functionality to restrict the accessibility of zoo elements for your front end users. Such restrictions can be applied according to the plan(s) subscribed by the users.
